Room.Name: Plankway to the Widow Maker
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the boarding plankway leading to the Widow Maker's main deck.
Room.LongDescription: The dangerous pirates and their trusty sidekicks don't much care for land lovers aboard their ship, and will probably make you walk the plank for coming aboard their ship. However, pirates are pretty stupid and can probably be bribed to leave you alone.
